formattedAddress: 470 W 62nd St, New York, NY 10069, USA
adrFormatAddress: 470 W 62nd St, New York, NY 10069, USA

originalText.text: We loved our experience at Riverside Daycare! Christina and the entire staff were so loving and we really felt like we were part of the family. Our son grew and learned so much while in their care, and we felt confident in his safety. He attended from 6 months to 2 years of age. It is also one of the most affordable childcare options on the Upper West Side, and an amazing value for what you pay!

text.text: We loved our experience at Riverside Daycare! Christina and the entire staff were so loving and we really felt like we were part of the family. Our son grew and learned so much while in their care, and we felt confident in his safety. He attended from 6 months to 2 years of age. It is also one of the most affordable childcare options on the Upper West Side, and an amazing value for what you pay!

originalText.text: Our daughter started at Riverside when she was just 6 months. I was so anxious and nervous to have her start daycare but the Riverside staff immediately made me feel at ease. She loves them so much and they treat her like family. We really like how it’s mixed ages. She’s done really well learning from the older kids. So glad we found this gem!

text.text: Our daughter started at Riverside when she was just 6 months. I was so anxious and nervous to have her start daycare but the Riverside staff immediately made me feel at ease. She loves them so much and they treat her like family. We really like how it’s mixed ages. She’s done really well learning from the older kids. So glad we found this gem!

originalText.text: We love Riverside Daycare! Our son has been going for almost two years and our second will be joining soon. Our oldest has developed so much here and made such great friends. The teachers and other parents/kids really feel like family. The communication is great and I love the app that sends updates throughout the day. We could not be happier with our experience here!

text.text: We love Riverside Daycare! Our son has been going for almost two years and our second will be joining soon. Our oldest has developed so much here and made such great friends. The teachers and other parents/kids really feel like family. The communication is great and I love the app that sends updates throughout the day. We could not be happier with our experience here!

originalText.text: Riverside Daycare is the best. Our daughter loves going there everyday. Everyone is so nice, they really care about the children and it shows!

text.text: Riverside Daycare is the best. Our daughter loves going there everyday. Everyone is so nice, they really care about the children and it shows!

originalText.text: Our daughter has attended Riverside Daycare since she was just 10 months old, and now she is 2. It would be an understatement to suggest that it was difficult for us as new parents to drop our baby off with strangers, but Christina and her team were very supportive, provided assurance when we needed it, and before we knew it, Riverside Daycare became an indispensable part of our lives. Since then, our daughter has become part of a close-knit group of daycare friends, she has experienced rapid intellectual, social and physical growth, and now, she runs from her stroller to hug her Riverside Daycare caregivers each morning when we arrive. We are incredibly grateful to be part of the Riverside Daycare family, and wholeheartedly recommend it to anyone in the difficult process of finding daily care for their young child.
